name: MHP SE (LSE:MHPC)
legal: CYPRUS SOCIETAS EUROPEA (EUROPEAN PUBLIC LIMITED LIABILITY COMPANY)
goal: MHP SE (LSE: MHPC), the parent company of a leading international agro-industrial group with headquarters in Ukraine, focusing primarily on the production of poultry and cultivation of grain, as well as other agricultural operations (meat processing and meat products ready for consumption).
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Customs, Enlargement, Environment, Food Safety, Trade
euInitiatives: MHP exports poultry products to the EU. It is interested in the EU’s trade and neighborhood policies. It is also interested in the EU’s food safety regime.
